ProductInfo.Features:
Genuine Windows® 8.1 64; Intel® CoreTM i7-4700MQ (2.4 GHz, up to 3.54 GHz, 6 MB cache, Quad Core)
17.3" Touch Screen LED-backlit display (1920 x 1080p); Blu-Ray Player with Super-Multi DVD Burner, HP Fingerprint Reader
2TB dual hard drives (2 x 1TB) with HP ProtectSmart Hard Drive Protection; 16GB DDR3L 1600MHz RAM (2 Dimms)
2GB NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M dedicated video memory and up to 4095MB total graphics memory, HDMI, 4 USB 3.0 Ports
Backlit Keyboard, Gigabit Ethernet, 802.11b/g/n, Beats Audio quad speakers and two subwoofers, 6 Cell Battery, 120 Watt Adapter
ProductInfo.Name: HP ENVY TouchSmart 17 17t-j100 Quad Edition Notebook PC (16GB RAM, 2TB Dual Hard Drives, 2GB graphic, Full 1080p HD, Bluray, Fingerprint Reader)
